Key Match Events: Jrue Holiday hit a 3 to end the rally and Boston quickly pushed the lead back to double digits
Miscellaneous Highlights: There were no incidents on the court Saturday night after Boston player Grant Williams was assessed a flagrant-two foul and ejected after plowing over Tatum at midcourt
Others: The Celtics outrebound the Hornets 44-34 with Charlotte playing without its top two centers Mark Williams and Nick Richards
The Hornets came out on fire in the third quarter
